summary: Reviewed the VDB module implementation; all Definition of Done items are now satisfied, including the modules.vdb configuration defaults and service plumbing.

completed: `raggd vdb` exposes `info`, `create`, `sync`, and `reset` commands backed by the service layer with the expected flags, mutual exclusivity rules, and JSON output.
Vector storage follows the deterministic sources/<source>/vectors/<name>/index.faiss layout with sidecar metadata; health surfaces drift/staleness and info `--json` mirrors those signals.

OpenAI provider abstraction delivers batching, retries/backoff, dimension enforcement, and concurrency heuristics; config defaults (provider/model/index/batch/concurrency/normalize/max_input_tokens) flow from `raggd.defaults.toml` through `AppConfig` into the service.
notes: Spec Definition of Done updated to check the configuration item previously outstanding.
